statements: SELECT * FROM property_history;
SELECT property_id, owner_id, transaction_timestamp FROM property_history;
SELECT * FROM property_history ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_history WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT id, property_id, owner_id FROM property_history WHERE transaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, property_id, owner_id, previous_owner_id, transaction_timestamp FROM property_history WHERE property_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, property_id, owner_id, transaction_timestamp FROM property_history WHERE owner_id = 456 AND previous_owner_id IS NULL;
SELECT id, property_id, owner_id, previous_owner_id, transaction_timestamp FROM property_history WHERE previous_owner_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY owner_id, transaction_timestamp;

SELECT id, transaction_timestamp, owner_id, previous_owner_id, property_id FROM property_history WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC, owner_id ASC;
SELECT id, property_id, owner_id, previous_owner_id, transaction_timestamp FROM property_history WHERE owner_id = 789 OR previous_owner_id = 101112 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_history;
SELECT owner_address, property_id, timestamp FROM property_history WHERE property_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM ownership_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT property_id, new_owner_address FROM ownership_changes WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, old_owner_address, new_owner_address FROM ownership_changes WHERE old_owner_address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT id, property_id, owner_address, timestamp FROM property_history WHERE property_id = 'a4ad9738-588e-4c58-80ce-a7a7c8f75cba'
SELECT id, property_id, owner_address, timestamp FROM property_history WHERE owner_address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, property_id, old_owner_address, new_owner_address, timestamp FROM ownership_changes ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT property_id, owner_address, timestamp FROM property_history WHERE owner_address ILIKE '%Smith%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, property_id, owner_address, timestamp FROM property_history WHERE owner_address ILIKE '%Road%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM property_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, address, value FROM property WHERE value > 100000 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM owner WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM property_history WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, address, value FROM property WHERE description ILIKE '%pool%';
SELECT * FROM property_history WHERE transaction_type='Sale' LIMIT 10;

SELECT ph.transaction_id, p.address, o.name FROM property_history ph JOIN property p ON ph.property_id = p.id JOIN owner o ON ph.owner_id = o.id WHERE ph.transaction_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY ph.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.address, p.value, COUNT(ph.id) AS transaction_count FROM property p LEFT JOIN property_history ph ON p.id = ph.property_id GROUP BY p.id HAVING transaction_count > 0 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT o.name AS owner_name, COUNT(ph.id) AS transaction_count FROM owner o LEFT JOIN property_history ph ON o.id = ph.owner_id GROUP BY o.id HAVING transaction_count > 1 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(p.value) AS max_property_value, ph.transaction_id FROM property p JOIN property_history ph ON p.id = ph.property_id GROUP BY ph.transaction_id ORDER BY max_property_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_name, purchase_price FROM Property WHERE purchase_price > 100000;
SELECT property_id, property_name FROM Property WHERE current_owner_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT block_id, block_data FROM Blockchain;
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_name, purchase_price FROM Property WHERE purchase_price > 100000;
SELECT property_name, owner_name FROM Property JOIN Owner ON Property.current_owner_id = Owner.owner_id;
SELECT property_name, transaction_date FROM Property JOIN Transaction ON Property.property_id = Transaction.property_id;
SELECT block_id, block_data FROM Blockchain ORDER BY block_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_id, address, owner_id FROM Property WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM Owner WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT chain_id, chain_name FROM Chain ORDER BY chain_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Property WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT property_id, address FROM Property ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM Owner WHERE owner_id = 3;
SELECT property_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Block WHERE num_transactions > 10;
